bioconda.name: barrnap
bioconda.summary: Barrnap predicts the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes. (bacteria, archaea, metazoan mitochondria and eukaryotes.)

biocontainers.name: barrnap
biocontainers.summary: Predict the location of ribosomal rna genes in genomes. it supports bacteria (5s,23s,16s), archaea (5s,5.8s,23s,16s), mitochondria (12s,16s) and eukaryotes (5s,5.8s,28s,18s).

biotools.summary: Predict the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes. It supports bacteria (5S,23S,16S), archaea (5S,5.8S,23S,16S), mitochondria (12S,16S) and eukaryotes (5S,5.8S,28S,18S).

bioschemas.name: Barrnap
bioschemas.summary: Predict the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes. It supports bacteria (5S,23S,16S), archaea (5S,5.8S,23S,16S), mitochondria (12S,16S) and eukaryotes (5S,5.8S,28S,18S).

galaxy.summary: Contains the Barrnap tool for finding ribosomal RNAs in FASTA sequences.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Predict the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes. It supports bacteria (5S,23S,16S), archaea (5S,5.8S,23S,16S), mitochondria (12S,16S) and eukaryotes (5S,5.8S,28S,18S).
